FBST -> XBST
46 42 53 54 04
58 42 53 54 04

CBST -> XBS2
43 42 53 54 00
58 42 53 32 00

_BIX -> XBIX
5F 42 49 58 00
58 42 49 58 00

BIF0 -> XIF0
42 49 46 30 00
58 49 46 30 00

BIF1 -> XIF1
42 49 46 31 00
58 49 46 31 00

BIF2 -> XIF2
42 49 46 32 00
58 49 46 32 00

BIF3 -> XIF3
42 49 46 33 00
58 49 46 33 00

BIF4 -> XIF4
42 49 46 34 00
58 49 46 34 00

BIFA -> XIFA
42 49 46 41 00
58 49 46 41 00

BSTS -> XSTS
42 53 54 53 00 A0
58 53 54 53 00 A0

BCRT -> XCRT
42 43 52 54 00
58 43 52 54 00

BRCP -> XRCP
42 52 43 50 00
58 52 43 50 00

BVOT -> XVOT
42 56 4F 54 00
58 56 4F 54 00

SMBR -> XMBR
53 4D 42 52 0B
58 4D 42 52 0B

SMBW -> XMBW
53 4D 42 57 0D
58 4D 42 57 0D

ECSB -> XCSB
45 43 53 42 07
58 43 53 42 07

TACH -> XACH
54 41 43 48 09
58 41 43 48 09
